articles.description: "Out of Character" is on-location again, this time with WWE's Eva Marie at a fancy steakhouse in Las Vegas.
articles.content:
By Ryan Satin FOX Sports Analyst 
What happens in Las Vegas usually stays there, but that doesn't apply to this weeks special "Out of Character" with guest Eva Marie.

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Apex Legends tap-strafing will be patched out, Respawn says
articles.description: Respawn Entertainment said that “tap-strafing,” a technique Apex Legends players had developed allowing them to change direction in midair, would be patched out with the 10.1 update coming to the game soon.
articles.content: Apex Legends developers will patch out tap strafing, a form of player movement used mainly by PC gamers that allows them to make sharp turns to evade or counterattack less mobile opponents. Respawn E… [+2571 chars]
